ERG-AUD.summary: Ergo (ERG) is a cryptocurrency . Users are able to generate ERG through the process of mining. Ergo has a current supply of 30,572,475 with 27,268,753 in circulation. The last known price of Ergo is 0.67070725 USD and is up 12.45 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 12 active market(s) with $405,905.01 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://ergoplatform.org/.
